metadata.title: HumanLink — Your computer, finally on your side.
metadata.description: HumanLink turns your PC into an assistant that sees, hears, learns and does things for you.

hero.headline: Your computer, finally on your side.
hero.subheadline: HumanLink turns your PC into an assistant that sees, hears, learns and does things for you.

whatIsIt.title: Not just another app. A new way to use your computer.
whatIsIt.description: HumanLink connects you directly to your computer. It can see what you see, hear what you say and help you in real time. No complicated setup. No tech jargon.

personalities.title: Choose who joins you.
personalities.subtitle: HumanLink adapts to you. Choose the personality that fits.

atlas.description: Straight to the point. Organises your professional life, prioritises tasks and never lets you forget what matters.
atlas.example: Atlas, schedule a meeting with John for tomorrow at 10am and prepare the notes from the last call.

nova.description: Like talking to a friend who knows everything. Relaxed, fun and always ready to help without pressure.
nova.example: Nova, find me a good Italian restaurant nearby and check the reviews.

spark.description: For those who think outside the box. Suggests unexpected ideas, helps with creative projects and never gives obvious answers.
spark.example: Spark, I need a visual concept for a sustainability campaign — surprise me.

sage.description: Your personal mentor. Teaches, challenges and pushes you to be better every day.
sage.example: Sage, I want to learn Python in 3 months — create a realistic plan and track my progress.

features.title: Everything you need. Nothing you don't.

memory.title: Remembers for you
memory.description: Never lose ideas, links or tasks again.

voice.title: Speak naturally
voice.description: Ask for things like you're talking to someone.

screen.title: Sees your screen
screen.description: Helps you while you work or study.

browse.title: Browses for you
browse.description: Searches, fills forms and finds what you need.

privacy.title: Private by default
privacy.description: Your data stays with you. Always.

wow.title: Feels like science fiction. But it's on your computer.
wow.description: HumanLink learns with you every day. The more you use it, the more useful it gets. Like an assistant that never forgets anything.

step2.title: Choose your personality
step2.description: Atlas, Nova, Spark or Sage — you decide.

step3.title: Start using it
step3.description: Talk, type or show — HumanLink understands.

items.quote: After installing, I can't go back.
items.name: John

items.quote: It's the first AI that feels like it's mine.
items.name: Martha

items.quote: Finally my PC does what I want without me having to explain everything.
items.name: Richard

items.question: Do I need to understand AI?
items.answer: No. If you can use a smartphone, you can use HumanLink.

items.question: Does it work offline?
items.answer: Whenever possible, yes. HumanLink was designed to work without internet.

items.question: Is it safe?
items.answer: HumanLink was designed with privacy first. Your data stays on your computer.

items.question: Can I change personality?
items.answer: Yes, at any time in settings.

items.question: Which computers does it work on?
items.answer: Windows 10+ and macOS 12+. Linux coming soon.

items.question: Can I cancel?
items.answer: At any time. No questions asked.
